alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones; Nolan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 11:33PM CST until February 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST FOR WESTERN JONES...NORTHERN NOLAN...FISHER AND NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 1130 PM CST, a cluster of severe thunderstorms continued from Sweetwater north into central Fisher County moving east at 55 mph. A West Texas Mesonet site 11 miles south of Sweetwater recorded a 55 mph wind gust. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Noodle around 1140 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hitson, Tuxedo, Stith, Gannon, Truby, Lake Sweetwater, Camp Boothe Oaks, Busby, Capitola and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 230 and 273. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
